# .github/workflows/

This directory contains GitHub Actions workflow files.

## Purpose

GitHub Actions workflows automate tasks like:

- Running tests on pull requests
- Building and deploying applications
- Running code quality checks
- Publishing releases

## Example Workflows

- `ci.yml` - Continuous integration (tests, linting)
- `deploy.yml` - Deployment automation
- `release.yml` - Release automation

Workflow files use YAML format and are automatically executed by GitHub Actions.
